title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Pitcher and Punch Bowl Atop, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard with Pitcher and Punch Bowl Atop
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular sideboard with raised shelf at back of top and another shelf just above floor level; edges of top two shelves carved; uppermost shelf raised on four carved supports in column motifs; front legs also carved as columns; atop top shelf: stack of dessert plates, cup and saucer, and pitcher; atop sideboard top: cloth runner, punch bowl, and three glasses.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Pitcher and Punch Bowl Atop, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-18.
